DOC.brief_summary: Primary Specific Aim : To test hypothesis amiloride improve vascular health young adult prehypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Study Amiloride Vascular Phenotypes Young Adults With Prehypertension
DOC.criteria: Prehypertensive : Having systolic BP 120 139 mmHg and/or diastolic BP 80 89 mmHg screen visit . BP measure manually tree time 10 minute interval subject sit quietly least 5 minute chair . The average last two BP measurement take consideration . Male female Caucasian AfricanAmerican origin . No history major past current medical illness ( diabetes , renal disease , liver disease etc . ) Not take medication affect blood pressure . HbA1C > 7.0 % screen visit . Serum potassium > 5.5 mEq/L screen and/or test visit due risk develop hyperkalemia . Serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/100 ml and/or creatinine clearance < 50 ml/min* ( Glomerular Filtration Rate Estimate Abbreviated MDRD Study Equation ) 35 screen and/or test visit due risk develop renal dysfunction . Female positive pregnancy test screen and/or test visit .
